title: Buffer Overflow in writeSingleBuffer
description: The function `writeSingleBuffer` does not validate the size of the input data before writing it to the USB device. This can lead to a buffer overflow if the input data exceeds the buffer size.
fix: Add validation to ensure that the input data length does not exceed the buffer size.

reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker can craft a malicious input data that exceeds the buffer size, leading to a buffer overflow and potentially executing arbitrary code.
